gurmukhi: ਡਮਾ ਡੱਮ ਡੳੁਰੂ ਬਹੁ ਬਾਜੇ || ਭੂਤ ਪ੍ਰੇਤ ਦਸੳੂ ਦਿਸ ਗਾਜੇ ||
transliteration: Damaa Damm Dauroo Bahu Baaje|| Bhoot Prêt Dasaoo Dis Gadje||
translation: The tabors began to resound and in all the ten directions, the ghosts and fiends began to roar.

gurmukhi: ਝਿਮ ਝਿਮ ਕਰਤ ਅਸਨ ਕੀ ਧਾਰਾ || ਨਾਚੇ ਰੁੰਡ ਮੁੰਡ ਬਿਕਰਾਰਾ ||੨੨||
transliteration: Jhim Jhim Karat Asan Kidhaaraa|| Naache Round Mounnd Bikraaraa||22||
translation: The swords glittered and their blows were showered and the headless trunks began to dance on all the four sides.22.

gurmukhi: ਬੱਜੇ ਢੋਲ ਸਨਾੲਿ ਨਗਾਰੇ || ਜੁਟੇ ਜੰਗ ਕੋ ਜੋਧ ਜੁਝਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Bajje Dhol Sanaae Nagadare|| Joute Jan Ko Jodh Jujhdare||
translation: The trumpets and drums resounded and their sound was heard; the warriors fought bravely in the war.

gurmukhi: ਖਹਿ ਖਹਿ ਮਰੇ ਅਪਰ ਰਿਸ ਬਢੇ || ਬਹੁਰਿ ਨ ਦੇਖੀਯਤ ਤਾਜੀਅਨ ਚਢੇ ||੨੩||
transliteration: Khah(i) Khah(i) Dare Apar Ris Badhe|| Bahur(i) Na Dekheeyat Taajeean Chadhe||23||
translation: They collided with one another, being filled with great anger, and they were never seen again, riding on their horses.23.

gurmukhi: ਜਾ ਪਰ ਮੁਸਟ ਤ੍ਰਿਸੂਲ ਪ੍ਹਾਰਾ || ਤਾਕਹੁ ਠੳੁਰ ਮਾਰ ਹੀ ਡਾਰਾ ||
transliteration: Jaa Par Moust Trisool Prahaaraa|| Taakauh Thaur Maar Hidaaraa||
translation: On whomsoever, there was the blow of the trident, held in the fist of Shiva, he was killed there and then,

gurmukhi: ਅੈਸੋ ਭਯੋ ਬੀਰ ਘਮਸਾਨਾ || ਭਕ ਭਕਾੲਿ ਤਹ ਜਗੇ ਮਸਾਨਾ ||੨੪||
transliteration: Aiso Bhayo Beer Ghamsaanaa|| Bhak Bhakaae Tah Jage Masaanaa||24||
translation: Virbhadra foutht such a fierce fight, that in great confusion, the ghosts and fiends were awakened.24.

gurmukhi: ਤੀਰ ਤਬਰ ਬਰਛੀ ਬਿਛੂਅ ਬਰਸੇ ਬਿਸਖ ਅਨੇਕ ||
transliteration: Teer Tabar Barchhibichhodha Dares Bisakh Anek||
translation: The arrows, daggers, lances and other types of weapons were showered,

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਸੂਰਾ ਜੂਝਤ ਭੲੇ ਸਾਬਤ ਬਚਾ ਨ ੲੇਕ ||੨੫||
transliteration: Sabh Sooraa Jrjhat Bhae Saabat Bachaa Na Aak||25||
translation: And all the warriors fell as martyras and none remained alive.25.

gurmukhi: ਕਟਿ ਕਟਿ ਮਰੇ ਨਰੇਸ ਦੁਖੰਡਾ || ਬਾੲਿ ਹਨੇ ਗਿਰ ਗੇ ਜਨ ਝੰਡਾ ||
transliteration: Kattee Kattee Dare Dares Doukhandaa|| Bade Hane Gir Ge Jan Jhandaa||
translation: The kings, chopped into bits, were lying the cluster of trees fallen down by the blow of wind.

gurmukhi: ਸੂਲ ਸੰਭਾਰ ਰੁਦ੍ਰ ਜਬ ਪਰਯੋ || ਚਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਬਚਿੱਤ੍ਰ ਅਯੋਧਨ ਕਰਯੋ ||੨੬||
transliteration: Sool Sanbhaar Rudra Jab Daryo|| Chittra Bachittra Ayodhan Daryo||26||
translation: When Rudra, holding his trident wrought the destruction, then the scence of that place looked very queer.26.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਜ ਭਾਜ ਤਬ ਚਲੇ ਨਰੇਸਾ || ਜੱਗ ਬਿਸਾਰ ਸੰਭਾਰਯੋ ਦੇਸਾ ||
transliteration: Bhaaj Bhaaj Tab Chale Daresaa|| Jagg Bisaar Sanbhdaryo Desaa||
translation: Then the kings, forgetting the Yajna, began to run away to their countries.

gurmukhi: ਜਬ ਰਣ ਰੁਦ੍ਰ ਰੁਦ੍ਰ ਹੂਅੈ ਧਾੲੇ || ਭਾਜਤ ਭੂਪ ਨ ਬਾਚਨ ਪਾੲੇ ||੨੭||
transliteration: Jab Ran Rudra Rudra Hooai Dhaae|| Bhaajat Bhoop Na Baachanndpaae||27||
translation: When Rudra pursued them as fury-incarnate, then none of the running kings could survive.27.
